name: Galaxy Bullet
description:
Space pirates attacked the earth. You are the only survivor with a spaceship that can save the world. Explore the Kuiper Belt in search of ammunition and fight on Mars, the Moon and the Earth against the space pirates.

Two modes:

  • Exploration mode: Find ammunition in Kuiper Belt
  • Story mode: Fight on Mars, Moon, and Earth against the space pirates

Controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Save bullets: F
  • Shoot: Space
